title: Ludovic: the snow gift
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, French Program Animation, Youth Studio Program and Therese Descary
brief_description: Ludovic, a young teddy bear who lives in a thatched cottage with his family watches the snow outside and dreams of tobogganing with his friends. His parents tell him he is too little, and Ludovic feels lonely, so he invents wonderful games to share with his new found friend, a doll that came to life.
